Judul: Spectral efficiency of M-QAM in frequency reuse radio systems
Abstrak:
The spectral efficiency of M-QAM
modulation has been investigated for frequency
reuse radio systems under the propagation conditions
of the land mobile radio environment. The
results indicate that, under certain circumstances
(of propagation and coverage requirements),
increasing the number of levels can lead to an
improvement in the spectral efficiency of interference
limited systems, but that, as better coverage
or service quality is sought, these spectral
efficiency improvements diminish.
Kata Kunci: M-QAM modulation, Frequency reuse, Land mobile radio
